verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
If there's one thing I know, You are never left alone
Cause' you can always call on Jesus' name

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
If there's one thing that I pray, It's Jesus helps you find a way, to make a
change and listen to your heart.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: God will take away your pain, if you choose to let it go.

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: If there's one thing I know

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Something in your eyes I see, reminds me of what used to be
When I was stil uncertain of the truth

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Sleepless nights that turn to days,
Alone inside an endless space.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: Counting on someone to see me through

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
How can I convince your heart
His light can find you in the dark

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: And only He can make your blind eyes see, for if we speak of lost things found

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: Of lives that have been turned around, Then tell me knows better child than me.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I would never stake my life on any lesser thing
Than the cross of Christ where He gave His life to ease my suffering.
